misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi, a competitor known for his unconventional style, is set to make his third appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Representing the Kullo Golf Club, Ossi is a familiar face around the course, known for his consistent play and strategic approach.

Despite his experience, Ossi has yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée or the individual Victor Trophy. However, his determination and passion for the game remain unwavering. His fans admire his commitment to improvement and his sportsmanlike conduct on the course.

Off the course, Ossi is known for his calm demeanor and thoughtful nature. On the course, however, Ossi's choice to rarely use his driver has raised eyebrows and sparked some debate among golf enthusiasts, with some questioning his masculinity as a result. Nonetheless, Ossi's unique approach to the game makes him a compelling player to watch, and his participation invariably adds an element of intrigue to the competition.
